channel.title: Crimson Scape 667 - 24/7
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=7]CrimsonScape[/SIZE][/B]
[I]A NEW ERA[/I]
[B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://www.crimsonscape.com][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] [B]Forum:[/B] [URL=http://www.crimsonscape.com/forums][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] [B]Client:[/B] [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/8kj24ddr31xcbor/Crimson%20Scape.zip?dl=0][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] [B]Jar:[/B] [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/64qtokk5wmkoek7/CrimsonScape.jar?dl=0][U]Click Here![/U][/URL]
[B]Why you should play CrimsonScape?[/B]
[B]Great Starter pack. Custom Dungeoneering. Donator Land. All new smooth and clean PvP system. Fair Combat and Skilling XP. Unique interfaces. Highly active Staff and Community. many custom Bosses and custom items to choose from. Multiple Minigames inc. Castle Wars, Barrows and many more. Prestige system with 50 prestiges with corresponding shops. ALL 25 skills working 100%. DoubleXP weekends. Stable and highly active economy. Many unique combat and skilling shops. Voting system with corresponding shop. F.o.G token system(PvM token system) with corresponding shop with awesome rewards. Unique Crystal Key reward chest, with amazing rewards. And much, much more.[/B]
[B]So[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.crimsonscape.com"]JOIN NOW[/URL] [B]and start your adventure today!![/B]
[B]Pictures below;[/B]
[B]Owner: Mike Co-Owner: Luke[/B][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/s0ybte.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2i1mmau.png[/img]
